pr_title: Preserve the null values for numeric type dimensions post-compaction.

timeline.message: Add selector null check to preserve null values as-is.

timeline.bodyText: Probably this should return 0 when doubles[index] == null && NullHandling.replaceWithDefault() == true? Otherwise it probably should throw an exception.
timeline.author: jihoonson

timeline.bodyText: We usually append "Test" at end of the class name instead of the beginning.
timeline.author: jihoonson

timeline.bodyText: Probably this should be return NullHandling.replaceWithDefault() ? false : doubles[index] == null.
timeline.author: jihoonson
jihoonson

timeline.bodyText: nit: I don't think it matters much, but perhaps NullPointerException or InvalidStateException would be more appropriate.
timeline.author: jihoonson

timeline.message: uh, float is indeed NOT a special case.
